update device
ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUFACTURER = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOGIN_TYPE = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGID = #{regid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROXY_PORT = #{proxyPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_NUM = #{unitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEVICE_CN = #{deviceCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_SN = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_IP = #{deviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_PORT = #{devicePort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEV_MAINTAINER = #{devMaintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEV_MAINTAINER_PH = #{devMaintainerPh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update device set ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTURER = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOGIN_TYPE = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGID = #{regid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROXY_PORT = #{proxyPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_NUM = #{unitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEVICE_CN = #{deviceCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_SN = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_IP = #{deviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_PORT = #{devicePort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEV_MAINTAINER = #{devMaintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEV_MAINTAINER_PH = #{devMaintainerPh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
